parameters.query:
SELECT
  team,
  COUNT(*) AS "Open Issues",
  (EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE - MIN(gh_updated_at))::text || ' days') AS "Stalest Issue",
  CONCAT((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM github.issues i2 WHERE gh_updated_at < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 weeks' AND state = 'open' AND (
    CASE
      WHEN team = 'Platform CMS Team' THEN labels LIKE '%Platform CMS Team%'
      WHEN team = 'Facilities' THEN labels LIKE '%Facilities%'
      WHEN team = 'Infrastructure' THEN labels LIKE '%Infrastructure%'
      WHEN team = 'Public Websites' THEN labels LIKE '%Public Websites%'
      WHEN team = 'Sitewide CMS' THEN labels LIKE '%Sitewide CMS%'
      WHEN team = 'User Support' THEN labels LIKE '%User Support%'
      ELSE labels NOT LIKE '%Platform CMS Team%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Facilities%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Infrastructure%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Public Websites%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Sitewide CMS%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%User Support%'
    END
  )), ' issues') AS "Inactive for 3+ Sprints",
  round(((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM github.issues i2 WHERE gh_updated_at < CURRENT_DATE - INTERVAL '6 weeks' AND state = 'open' AND (
    CASE
      WHEN team = 'Platform CMS Team' THEN labels LIKE '%Platform CMS Team%'
      WHEN team = 'Facilities' THEN labels LIKE '%Facilities%'
      WHEN team = 'Infrastructure' THEN labels LIKE '%Infrastructure%'
      WHEN team = 'Public Websites' THEN labels LIKE '%Public Websites%'
      WHEN team = 'Sitewide CMS' THEN labels LIKE '%Sitewide CMS%'
      WHEN team = 'User Support' THEN labels LIKE '%User Support%'
      ELSE labels NOT LIKE '%Platform CMS Team%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Facilities%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Infrastructure%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Public Websites%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%Sitewide CMS%' AND labels NOT LIKE '%User Support%'
    END
  )) / COUNT(*)::float * 100)) AS "3+ Sprint Inactive Percentage"
FROM (
  SELECT
    gh_updated_at,
    state,
    CASE
      WHEN labels LIKE '%Platform CMS Team%' THEN 'Platform CMS Team'
      WHEN labels LIKE '%Facilities%' THEN 'Facilities'
      WHEN labels LIKE '%Infrastructure%' THEN 'Infrastructure'
      WHEN labels LIKE '%Public Websites%' THEN 'Public Websites'
      WHEN labels LIKE '%Sitewide CMS%' THEN 'Sitewide CMS'
      WHEN labels LIKE '%User Support%' THEN 'User Support'
      ELSE 'Unassigned'
    END AS team
  FROM github.issues
) i
WHERE state = 'open'
GROUP BY team
ORDER BY team asc;
